timeline.bodyText: You aren't going to log this message anymore?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: This was removed because it was getting logged twice just before the IOException is raised. That's why the bad data received prefix was moved to the other log statement.
replies.author: jsetton

timeline.bodyText: Is there any way to prevent calling getHexByte if it wouldn't be logged anyway? Maybe call it inside the bail method?
timeline.author: cpmeister

replies.bodyText: The message is being logged in the bail method. So I am unsure why you are asking this?
replies.author: jsetton

timeline.author: cpmeister
cpmeister

replies.bodyText: There are a ton of logger.trace calls across the code. What's the point of this?
replies.author: jsetton

timeline.message:
added undocumented 0x5c message code definition

Signed-off-by: jsetton <jeremy.setton@gmail.com>

added undocumented 0x5c message code definition
